response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's a perfect match. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your appreciation and understanding of the product's true worth, which is valued at $1,000,000 by you. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
